name: Quantify Cell Cycle Phases from Microscopy
description: Quantify the percentage of cells in each cell cycle phase using Calcofluor white stained microscopy images. Processes microscopy images where cell walls/septa are stained with Calcofluor white, segments individual cells, extracts features, and classifies each cell into G1, S, or G2/M phase.

image_paths.description: List of file paths to microscopy images of cells stained with Calcofluor white

instructions: git clone https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/Biomni && cd /tmp/Biomni && pip install -e . && cd /Users/david/git/prod_apps/biomni/cell_biology && python quantify_cell_cycle_phases_from_microscopy.py
